lines.text: There isn't a job that is too tough for me, except, the one time I was married to a real stubborn woman.

[chokes on coffee]
I told you we should forget about this crazy guy,

[using her psychic powers to locate Cosmos]
Wait, turn off the radio! I can hear it... their song... it's close!

[witnessing Battra's arrival]
What is all this? What's happening to our planet?

[Battra shoots lasers at Mothra but misses and hits Godzilla instead]
Oh no, they're getting pissed off!
